name: 楊重光
objective:
本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.
schedule:
1-3 : XRD檢測與相關原理 X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis and its theory fundamentals
4-6 : SEM檢測與相關原理 Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) analysis and its theory fundamentals
7-9 : AFM檢測與相關原理Atomic Force Microscope (AFM) analysis and its theory fundamentals
10-12 : Raman檢測與相關原理 Raman spectroscopy analysis and its theory fundamentals
13-15 : FTIR檢測與相關原理 Fourier-Transform Infrared Spectroscopy (FTIR) analysis and its theory fundamentals
16-19 : 檢測實作與結果探討 Practice and results discussion
scorePolicy:
30% Midterm exam
40% Final examination
20% Quiz
10% Reports
